author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Prince Charles Recovers From Coronavirus, Exits Self-Isolation After 7 Days
description: The 71-year-old, who is heir to the British throne, spent seven days in quarantine at his home on the Balmoral estate in Scotland.
content:
Prince Charles has recovered from coronavirus and left self-isolation after seven days.
The 71-year-old, who is heir to the British throne, spent a week in quarantine at his home on the Balmoral estate in Scotland. Charles remains in good health and is follo… [+4343 chars]
